recommendations: Adnan Firoze “Mr. Arman has been excellent in extra curricular activities including securing the President position of ACM Student Chapter at NSU which is a coveted position and he successfully organized a plethora of events conducive to engineering students. However, that is not the end of the story. His academic prowess is outstanding and I shall emphasize on that below. The academic achievements are given below: 1. Champion of IEEE DAY Hackathon 2. Presented Poster in Nsyss 2017 at BUET (2017 4th International Conference on Networking, Systems, and Security (4th NSysS 2017), December 18-20, 2017) 3. Presented Paper in ICICSA (International Conference on Inventive Computing Systems and Applications (ICICSA 2018) 4. Published Journal in International Journal of Pure and Applied Mathematics (IJPAM) The project he did under my supervision in the course - CSE 311 (Database Management System): APHAAS: Towards cloud-based intelligent CS academic project hosting for student influential which represent a collaborative computer science education approach through project sharing platform and proposed a user-friendly, cloud-based project storage service, which will infer to the computer science education. Then extended the infrastructure from the user based to the academic institution based cloud, by which, project influence will spread to a big scale. He is also a co-author of one of my top research papers to be presented in IEEE ICMLA 2018, Orlando, FL, USA. This shows his penchant for research. I wish him all the best in his future endeavors. He is one of the most versatile students I have come across. The potential for his success is extremely high in my opinion. ”

Zunayeed Zahir “It is my immense pleasure to write a recommendation for Mr. Aziz Arman. He is one of the students in our department. Currently, he is doing a course on Senior Design Project under my supervision me. I first came to know Aziz when I became the Faculty Advisor to NSU ACM Student Chapter. He is the Chair (President) of that student branch. I highly admire his leadership and management skills that he possesses as a leader of a student community. Aziz is a dynamic individual along with a cooperative and assistive attitude towards anything that the team needs. He excels at supervising, guiding and motivating other members of the team. He is a natural leader and problem solver, easily identifying and proposing solutions to any road bumps that the team hits along the way. Many times, he has assisted me and suggested me some fruitful and precise solutions to the crisis in the time of need. Aziz is also great at staying on task. More than once, he’s guided the group back to the immediate topic at hand when its focus had begun to err off track. Not only does Aziz possess the leadership skills needed for a team leader, but he also has the behind-the-scenes skills as well. He aptly manages paperwork, orders stock, and help plan promotional activities and ensures that the entire business is running smoothly. Apart from his leadership, managerial and corporate skills, he is also a competent student. His good grip on his academic sector is admirable as well. He pertains good analytical skills. His project on Wireless Sensor Network demonstrated his ability to come up with a detailed understanding of the technical aspects of the project, alongside it’s impact to the society. His overall academic performance also reflects her aptitude that he has over his coursework. He excelled in all the project demonstration and presentation over the semester. He even did some relevant survey on the project topic that readily helped to support his project hypothesis. Alongside is demonstration and presentation skills, he is proficient in interpersonal and communication skills. His written work is both clear and concise, as well as interesting to read. He demonstrated his oral articulateness in the discussion sections that were an integral part of the course. At a personal level, Aziz is a well-disciplined, industrious student with a pleasant personality. He went above and beyond the course requirements in the quantity and quality of his project, putting in a lot of extra research and attending office hours every week. Eventually, he’s also planning to participate in a Capstone Project Showcase, a department requirement for project demonstration in front of the entire university arena. Moreover, he is planning to publish his project idea once he’s complete with his work and gets my approval. Aziz is unquestionably an exceptional candidate for being an entrepreneur as he possesses a mixed blend of a manager, self-motivated team leader and a proactive problem solver for any sce”
